Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Neera Kar "asindhimai"
Reviews.Content: The product was not even close to what it looked in the pictures. It was very crude/rough looking when I got itNevertheless, the seller was excellent in responding and readily agreed to not only refund the cost but also shipping and handling both ways. I will certainly continue to do business with them

Reviews.Title: good inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: Awake "Awake"
Reviews.Content: Works good, was inexpensive and it's easy to use. It's easy to charge. Uh, I need 4 more words for this review. There! :)

Reviews.Title: Stay with top name products
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Martell
Reviews.Content: Did everything according to instructions. It simply did not work. I was told by a camera proffesional it had a factory deffect.
